Sample HTML Document

This is the first paragraph of the sample HTML document used for testing the local-rag HTML parser.

Section One

This section contains information about text extraction from HTML files. BeautifulSoup is used to convert HTML content into plain text while preserving some structural information.

Section Two

The second section verifies that multiple headings and paragraphs are correctly extracted and that HTML tags are stripped from the output.

Subsection

A nested subsection to test heading hierarchy extraction.
